item.description:
Looking for A Job or Have 1 to Offer? Come Meet and Network with Others at New Venue in Dedham! Maybe Find Your New Work Position or Opportunity to Increase Income!

There will be Staffing Companies and other Businesses to Connect with! Restaurant & Hospitality - TGI Friday's has Jobs to Apply for!

Bring business cards, resumes, and a professional attitude because it's time to make some valuable new business contacts in 2013.
Dress code is business casual


(Appetizers, Plenty of Parking, and Free Raffle with Event Tickets plus More Giveaways to Win at Our Event) Just off 128 on Rte. 1 North across from Panera and before Best Buy/BJ's


Advance Tickets are $5 and $8 Cash at the door if Available!

 

Have All Levels of Software Engineers and other IT positions to offer!  Plus looking for Corporate Controllers, other Accounting, Finance, Restaurant/Hospitality, It Consulting, Mortgage Agents, & More Jobs!
item.name: Job Seeking and Opportunities Networking Event in Dedham (50+ Expected)
